content:
@nicola (RIO/SS) -- over on the #Announcements stream, you said:

We already have few on fhir.js, fhir.py, fhirpath.js, fhirbase and starting fhirmapping.js - guys can join.

What is fhirmapping.js? I haven't heard of it before, and I don't see any other reference to it on Zulip (or anywhere else).
It's not yet released, but our students started FHIR mapping language Implementation in js ;) Are you interested in it?
(as a user - not a coder mind :) )

@nicola (RIO/SS) - I just like to know what's out there! If I had the time, I'd be glad to contribute, but right now I'm kind of neck-deep in other projects. A FHIR mapping implementation for JS sounds great though -- I can see it being especially useful to support translation from one version of FHIR to another. Looking forward to hearing more!
Is there any work on this? I was thinking of starting some prototype work on this unless it's underway...
